metadata.feature_description: Specialized handling for image file search results with thumbnail generation.

steps.action: Navigated to home page and logged in as SuperUser (host)
steps.actual: Login successful, SuperUser Account displayed in top navigation

steps.action: Entered 'logo' in search box and submitted search
steps.expected: Search results page displays image files
steps.actual: Search results page loaded at /en-us/Search-Results?Search=logo showing 'About 1 Results'

steps.action: Verified image search result is displayed correctly
steps.expected: Image file cavalier-logo.png appears in search results with proper metadata
steps.actual: cavalier-logo.png displayed with URL path, description showing 'alier-logo.png...alier-logo png image/png users/001/01/1/', and Source: Images label

steps.action: Reviewed search result metadata for image file
steps.expected: Image file should be categorized as 'Images' source type
steps.actual: Search result shows 'Source: Images' confirming PNG file is correctly detected and categorized as an image type

steps.action: Clicked on cavalier-logo.png search result link
steps.expected: Image URL should be generated and image should be accessible
steps.actual: Image opened directly in browser at /Portals/_default/Users/001/01/1/cavalier-logo.png with page title showing dimensions (225x60)

steps.action: Navigated to Content > Assets in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Asset Manager should display with access to site files
steps.actual: Asset Manager opened showing folder structure: Global Assets, My Website, Test Portal

steps.action: Navigated to Home > Images folder to view image files
steps.expected: Image files should display with generated thumbnails
steps.actual: Images folder displayed with multiple image files showing circular thumbnails: batch_image_3.png, cavalier-tv.png, CTA-1.jpg through CTA-8.jpg, and other PNG/JPG files with visible thumbnail previews

steps.action: Attempted to access non-existent image URL: /Portals/0/Images/non_existent_image_12345.png
steps.expected: System should return appropriate error without crashing
steps.actual: System returned HTTP Error 404.0 - Not Found with detailed error page explaining 'The resource you are looking for has been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable'

observations: ImageResultController extends FileResultController and provides localized search type name for images
Image file types are detected based on extension matching against Globals.glbImageFileTypes configuration
Thumbnails are generated via ThumbnailsController API at API/DNNCorp/PersonaBar/Assets/ThumbnailDownLoad endpoint
Search results correctly differentiate between 'document' and 'image' search types using SearchTypeId
The FileCrawlerController handles cleanup of documents that were previously indexed as documents but are now recognized as images
